Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
public class Board extends Object
This class contains the information and the actions that can be performed on a school's Board.

  • Method Details

    • addToLobby

      public void addToLobby(Color student)
      Add a student object to the board's lobby.
      Parameters:
      student - : student instance being added to the board's lobby.

    • removeFromLobby

      public boolean removeFromLobby(Color student)
      Remove a student object from the board's lobby
      Parameters:
      student - : student instance being removed to the board's lobby
      Returns:
      true if the student has been correctly removed, false otherwise.

    • addToTable

      public boolean addToTable(Color student)
      Add each student object to the table corresponding to their color. This method also checks if the students is the third, the sixth or the ninth added to the table for the expert game mode for earn money.
      Parameters:
      student - instance of the student that has to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the student is the third, the sixth or the ninth added to the table, false otherwise.

    • removeFromTable

      public void removeFromTable(Color student)
      Remove each student object from the table.
      Parameters:
      student - : instance of the student that has to be removed.

    • switchStudents

      public boolean switchStudents(ArrayList<Color> tableStudents, ArrayList<Integer> lobbyStudentsIndexes)
      Method switchStudents switches the selected table students with the selected lobby students.
      Parameters:
      tableStudents - : color of student tiles that are being moved from the table to the lobby.
      lobbyStudentsIndexes - : indexes of the lobby student tiles that are being from the lobby to the table.
      Returns:
      true if the input parameters are correct and the switch has been correctly executed, false otherwise.

    • addTeacher

      public void addTeacher(Color teacher)
      Add each teacher object to the table corresponding to its color
      Parameters:
      teacher - : instance of the teacher that has to be added

    • removeTeacher

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      instance of the teacher that has been removed

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • isTableEmpty
